suite.name: CreateCharacters

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{usuario} = { email=santos.michaelbrendo@gmail.com }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '43', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "santos.michaelbrendo@gmail.com"}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${client_key} = 61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{HEADERS} = { client_key=61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5 }

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
kw.msg: ${HEADERS} = {'client_key': '61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5'}

kw.name: DELETE
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/delorean path_url=/delorean headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Factory Thanos
kw.msg: &{personagem} = { name=Alicia Howell | aliases=Thanos | age=3000 | team=Ordem Negra | active=False }

kw.name: POST New Characters
POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5', 'Content-Length': '99', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Alicia Howell", "aliases": "Thanos", "age": 3000, "team": "Ordem Negra", "active": false}'
${response} = <Response [200]>
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

test.name: NÃ£o deve cadastrar personagem com o mesmo nome

kw.name: Factory Deadpool
kw.msg: ${personagem} = {'name': 'Wade Wilson', 'aliases': 'Deadpool', 'age': 45, 'team': 'X-Force', 'active': True}

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5', 'Content-Length': '92', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Wade Wilson", "aliases": "Deadpool", "age": 45, "team": "X-Force", "active": true}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: POST New Characters
POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.22.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61bba14dbfb4af00166e9ce5', 'Content-Length': '92', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Wade Wilson", "aliases": "Deadpool", "age": 45, "team": "X-Force", "active": true}'
${response} = <Response [409]>
${response} = <Response [409]>

kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
